hero.headline: Where the Mediterranean Meets the Indian Ocean

story.title: A Private Sanctuary Designed Around Light and Silence
story.paragraph1: Alborán is rooted in Mediterranean architecture yet shaped by the tropical stillness of Gili Air. Stone textures, warm tones and open spaces create a natural rhythm between interior and exterior.
story.paragraph2: It is not simply a place to stay — it is a space intentionally designed for calm, privacy and quiet refinement.

highlights.title: Private
highlights.description: A fully private residence with no shared spaces.

highlights.description: Infinity pool designed for quiet, uninterrupted moments.

highlights.title: Architecture
highlights.description: Mediterranean stone textures blended with tropical light.

highlights.title: Setting
highlights.description: Secluded within the calm rhythm of Gili Air.

finalInvitation.title: A Stay Designed for Presence.
finalInvitation.subtitle: Alborán is created for those who value privacy, stillness and intentional design. If this resonates with you, your time here begins with a simple conversation.

hero.title: Begin with a Conversation.
hero.subtitle: Each stay at Alborán is arranged personally. Share your dates and intentions, and we will respond thoughtfully.
